thread.title: Jeff JM
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Jeff JM

author: Jeff JM
title: Jeff JM
text: I contacted SelectQuote: to seek a better plan for homeowner's insurance than I was receiving. Following a comprehensive review of what I was seeking, I was given a selection of 2 companies that met my options and this was then reduced by one. The remaining company had an even better plan offer than expected and saved me $337 from my existing plan.
